title: Duke-UNC and the Coach K Goodbye
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the back-and-forth Duke-UNC game and the final Duke game coached by Coach K. Are they happy or sad to see the legendary coach go? Also, they breakdown tonight’s Kansas-UNC matchup. Will the favorite, the Jayhawks finish strong tonight and win it all? Why Luka and the Mavs are positioning themselves for a long playoff run, but are they good enough to make it to the Western Conference Finals? We take a look at red hot MVP race. Is it Giannis, Jokic or Embiid? Why one player stand out about the rest and might have already won it. Plus, we have to show love to the South Carolina Gamecocks and Coach Staley. Why winning this title is only the beginning. All that and more….
